siteOffers.title: Site Offers
siteOffers.firstOfferDescription: Just like the uncle at the wedding doesn't need much, this package covers the basic needs that can be added to your website!
siteOffers.secondOfferDescription: Tell us about the style of your wedding, optionally share some inspirations, and we will create something unique for you.

instructions.step1: Choose one of the templates on your own or with our help:
instructions.step2: Decide which elements of the template you want to keep and which to remove.
instructions.step3: Think about the address you would like your website to have. You can read more about addresses below:
instructions.step4: Contact us, tell us about the style of your wedding, and we will customize the template's color scheme for you!

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Call us or contact us on Instagram, WhatsApp, Messenger, or simply use the form and let's start creating your website.
contact.messagePlaceholder: Write about your chosen offer. Tell us about your wedding or simply write a message to setup a meeting with us ðŸ˜Š
